name: kitn-doctor-agent
description: Troubleshooting agent for kitn projects â€” diagnoses configuration, import, and dependency issues with guided fixes
docs: Interactive troubleshooting agent for kitn projects. Uses the kitn-diagnose-tool to inspect the project, then provides guided fixes for issues found. Handles: wrong imports (@kitnai vs @kitn), missing files, stale lock entries, missing dependencies, and configuration problems.
